attributes.action: sections of council housing estates to be only for people with disabilities or children with  disabilties
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to ask the government to put aside certain housing estates strictly for people with  disabilities.Many families struggle with abuse,harassment attacks etc from people who simply do not understand This option gives people who understand and respect each persons needs and live happily and securly without any worries
It may seem like segregation but it is a great option for people like us who have a family with autism I myself have autism.,and have suffered with abuse for many years
